StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Developmental Mechanisms of Human Congenital Heart Disease

Person.Organization: ALBERT EINSTEIN COLLEGE OF MEDICINEALBERT EINSTEIN COLLEGE OF MEDICINE, INC

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The dataset used for the analyses described in this manuscript was obtained from the database of Genotype and Phenotype (dbGaP) found at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap [accession number phs001339.v1.p1]. Samples and associated data for the study "Developmental Mechanisms of Human Congenital Heart Disease" were provided by Elizabeth Goldmutz, M.D. and Beverly Emanuel, Ph.D. at the Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia, and Bernice Morrow, Ph.D. at the Albert Einstein College of Medicine, for their project funded by the Eunice Kennedy Shriver National Institute of Child Health and Human Development [P01 HD070454 – PI: Bernice Morrow].
Policy.ic_specific_access_term:
All requestors and data users must provide a local Institutional Review Board (IRB) letter from their respective institution approving conduct of the proposed research project. The IRB letter must explicitly reference the use of the "Developmental Mechanisms of Human Congenital Heart Disease" dataset.
The annual progress report should cite work done that relates specifically to the "Developmental Mechanisms of Human Congenital Heart Disease" dataset and not just a generic report for a series of datasets that may also have been requested at the same time.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.
